name: Duoism
description:
This game was an entry for Global Game Jam 2022
If you like this game, please give us a ❤️ at https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/dua-4

Duoism - The Balance between Light and Dark.

Yin and Yang. 

Rage and Love. 

In the eternal battle of opposites, one shall not forget the dependence on one another.

Experience duality with one of your friends. Get together on your couch, take your controllers and fight together in an everchanging world of light and dark.

Controls:
The game is intended (and recommended) as a two player game, but you can play it as a single player if you really want to.

For each player, you need an Xbox-like controller. In the menu, just move your stick to join. Click on one of the buttons to select a menu item. Start the game!

In the game, you move with the left stick and aim with the right stick. You shoot with the right trigger. Explore the game and have fun!

Keyboard and mouse control is possible but experimental.

Platforms:

The game is available as download for Windows and Linux. Or you can just play it directly in the browser.

Soundtracks can be downloaded and used under the CC0 license
